0.3.0
=====

2015-02-05

* added `--body` to draw the Moon or Mars
* added `--no-night`
* added `--orbit-res`
* added topographic features
* improved twilight shading
* various minor cosmetics


0.2.0
=====

2015-01-30

* added info panels
* added `--apsides`
* added `--crosshair`
* fixed excessive use of geolocation API
* fixed various overflow errors


0.1.0
=====

2015-01-26

* initial release
